rooms.description: A spacious living room featuring Art Deco elements such as geometric patterns and metallic accents. The living area overlooks the garden for natural light and a seamless indoor-outdoor connection.
An elegantly designed dining area with Art Deco-inspired fixtures and ambient lighting, facilitating family meals with a focus on positive energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
A versatile guest room designed with Art Deco styling, featuring rich textures and modern amenities to provide comfort for visitors.
A compact but functional servants' quarters located adjacent to the main living area, ensuring privacy and convenience.
A dedicated home office space integrated into the farmhouse with Art Deco accents, providing a quiet work environment overlooking the garden.
An energy-efficient kitchen designed in an Art Deco style with modern amenities and adherence to local building norms.

openings.description: A robust front door featuring Art Deco detailing, ensuring secure entry and proper alignment with Vastu principles.
openings.material: reinforced steel with decorative glass inserts

openings.description: Large windows in the living area that open to a scenic garden view, enhancing natural light and ventilation.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with Art Deco influences, featuring ample closet space and a serene view of the garden.
A comfortable secondary bedroom designed with minimal yet functional Art Deco elements, ensuring privacy and functionality.
Modern bathroom design incorporating Art Deco accents and energy-efficient fixtures, located strategically for ease of access.

openings.description: A balcony providing an outdoor retreat with stunning views of the surrounding garden, aligning with Vastu by allowing fresh air circulation.
